attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned deplore the proposed closure of over 44% of Accident & Emergency Units in West London.

Allready an 8 hour wait at Hillingdon is frequent & the addition of patients diverted from Ealing well be catastrophic.

Other alternatives to Ealing at Hammersmith & Charing Cross Hospitals are also on the closure list as is North Middlesex.

The extra travel in peak traffic times has obviously not been taken into account & alone could cause fatal delays to treatment.

Also Hillingdon has had complete rebuilding plans for several years, which could disrupt A & E facilities there.

Hillingdon Hospital allredy has all accomodation in use & any enlargement could result in vital treatment clinics being displaced.

Therefore we call upon the secretary of State for Health to cancel all plans for Closures of A & E facilities in West London.

rejection.details: Please see: stop the planned closing of A&E departments in four west london hospitals
